appName.description: Go to Crunchyroll.com, explore anime and pick one based on the score provided by the community of MyAnimeList.net

appDesc.description: Go to Crunchyroll.com, explore anime and pick one based on the score provided by the community of MyAnimeList.net which will be showed thanks to this extension! This is a fan-made extension
